import React from 'react'; import Card from '../../../../components/common/layout/Card'; const DocumentCard = ({ title, description, isAdded, addedDate }) => (
{isAdded && ( )}

{title}

{description}

{isAdded ? ( <> Added on {addedDate} ) : ( )}
); const FoundationDocuments = () => { const documents = [ { title: 'Articles of Association', description: 'Standard or customised rules for how the company operates', isAdded: true, addedDate: 'Jan 15, 2024' }, { title: 'Shareholder Agreement', description: 'Defines rights, responsibilities, and dispute resolution between founders/shareholders', isAdded: true, addedDate: 'Jan 15, 2024' }, { title: 'Founders\' Agreements', description: 'Clarifies roles, equity, IP ownership, vesting, and commitments', isAdded: false } ]; return (
{documents.map((doc, index) => ( ))}
); }; export default FoundationDocuments;
